flawed_nl_solution:
Hansel makes $30000 and received a 10% raise so his raise is 30000*0.1 = $3000.0
Hansel now makes 30000+ 3000.0 = $<<30000+3000.0=33000.0>>33000.0 a year
Gretel makes $30000 and received a 15% raise so her raise is 30000*0.15 = $4500.0
Gretel now makes 30000+4500.0 = $<<30000+4500.0=34500.0>>34500.0 a year
If Gretel makes $34500.0 a year and Hansel makes $33000.0 then Gretel makes 34500.0-33000.0 = $<<34500.0-33000.0=1050.0>>1050.0 more a year than Hansel

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1500.0, not 1050.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
